item.title: An address deposited 4759 BNB to a CEX, and if sold, it would yield a profit of nearly $600,000.
item.description: August 4th. Based on the monitoring of on-chain analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, the address 0xc0C...c2249, three hours ago, deposited all 4759 BNB that was purchased in November 2024 at an average price of $630 into Binance (approximately $3.59 million). If sold, a profit of $591,000 would be obtained, with a return rate of 20%.However, when compared to BNB's previous high of $861.1, a potential profit of $508,000 was missed.

item.title: In the last 24 hours, CEX Net Outflow of 1017.72 BTC
item.description: On August 4th, according to Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, CEX had a total net outflow of 1017.72 BTC. The top three exchanges with outflows were as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 1037.51 BTC;· OKX, with an outflow of 398.08 BTC;· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 286.09 BTC.In addition, Bitfinex saw an inflow of 495.03 BTC and ranked first in the inflow list.

item.title: H100 Group Raises Approximately $2.2 Million to Buy More Bitcoin
item.description: On August 4th, according to @btcNLNico, the Swedish listed company H100 Group announced that it had raised 21.2 million Swedish Krona (approximately $220,000) and intended to use this amount to purchase more Bitcoin.

item.title: Japanese publicly listed company Convano has announced that it will once again raise 2 billion yen to increase its BTC holdings
item.description: On August 4th, as monitored by @btcNLNico, the publicly traded Japanese company and nail salon operator Convano Co., Ltd. announced today that it has raised an additional 2 billion yen (approximately $13.54 million), and this additional funds will be used to increase its Bitcoin holdings in August. The company intends to hold 21,000 Bitcoins by the end of March 2027.

item.title: The Smarter Web Company has announced a funding round of 8.1 million euros, intended for the purchase of Bitcoin
item.description: On August 4th, as per @btcNLNico, the London-listed tech firm The Smarter Web Company declared a capital raising of €8.1 million (approximately $10.75 million), with the intention of purchasing a greater amount of Bitcoin.

item.title: European publicly traded company Capital B raises €11.5 million to advance its Bitcoin Treasury Strategy
item.description: On August 4th, as reported by @btcNLNico, the European publicly-listed company Capital B (formerly known as The Blockchain Group) announced a capital raising of €11.5 million (approximately $13.3 million) in order to advance its Bitcoin treasury company strategy.

item.title: In the past 7 days, El Salvador has accumulated an additional 8 BTC, bringing its total holdings to 6258.18 BTC.
item.description: On August 4th, according to the data from the Ministry of Finance of El Salvador, in the past 7 days, El Salvador has added an additional 8 Bitcoins. As a result, its total Bitcoin holdings have reached 6258.18 BTC, with a value of more than $7.15 billion.

item.title: MAGIC Surges Above $0.2, Up Over 22% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 4th, according to HTX market data, MAGIC exceeded $0.2 and is now trading at $0.2011, with a 24-hour increase of 22.28%.

item.title: The current mainstream CEX and DEX funding rate displays a divergence in market trend, with bearish and neutral views coexisting.
item.description: On August 4th, according to Coinglass data, the current funding rates of mainstream CEX and DEX show a divergent market trend, with both bearish and neutral sentiments. The specific funding rates for mainstream coins are shown in the attached image.BlockBeats Note: The funding rate is a fee set by cryptocurrency trading platforms to maintain the balance between the contract price and the underlying asset price. It is usually applicable to perpetual contracts and is a mechanism for the exchange of funds between long and short traders. The trading platform does not charge this fee. It is used to adjust the cost or profit of traders holding contracts to keep the contract price close to the underlying asset price.When the funding rate is 0.01%, it represents the baseline rate. When the funding rate is greater than 0.01%, it indicates a generally bullish market. When the funding rate is less than 0.005%, it signifies a generally bearish market.

item.title: Analyst: Rate Cut Expectation Heating Up in Tandem with SEC's New Policy, Market Sentiment Improving
item.description: On August 4th, according to The Block, Vincent Liu, the Chief Investment Officer of Kronos Research, stated that in the midst of macroeconomic uncertainty and institutional buying, the current market is demonstrating a sense of "cautious optimism." The Fear and Greed Index is moving towards "greed," and whale accumulation and expectations of rate cuts are driving traders to reallocate risk assets.Investors are focusing on the U.S. July CPI data, which will be released on August 12th, as a key indicator for the next interest rate hike or cut decision. Although the Fed maintained rates at the July FOMC meeting and Powell stated that a September rate cut still depends on economic data, CME FedWatch data shows that the market expects a probability of more than 80% for a 0.25 percentage point cut.Furthermore, Liu believes that the U.S. SEC's "Project Crypto" could be beneficial to the market in the medium to long term. This project will reduce regulatory uncertainty, promote the growth
